What Our Clients Say

  • Our Clients
  • Testimonials
  • Expert Videos
  • Case Studies
  • Brochures
Filter

Dezan Shira has played a crucial role in helping our China expansion from a RO to a full-fledged trading entity - through careful planning, in-person meetings, and qualitative strategic advice. The setup is particularly complex in China, but we were led through the legal and tax intricacies, regulations, and obligations towards local authorities smoothly. We were delighted to close the circle by inaugurating our China office with Dezan Shira’s help.

Andreas KambachDirector Sales Asia Pacific, VSM Abrasives

Bloomsbury Institute, a UK higher education provider, engaged Dezan Shira to incorporate their company in India and assist with employment and payroll. They efficiently handled the complex process, enabling them to set up the company, including a bank account, and employ 7 staff members in Hyderabad. Their multi-disciplinary team is a pleasure to work with and provided comprehensive services in-house. Client service and support have been excellent and they continue to ensure our compliance with company law and assist with payroll services.

John FairhurstPrincipal and CEO at Bloomsbury Institute

Ping has offices in China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Vietnam and Thailand. We’ve been a client of Dezan Shira’s for 25 years, from setting up companies, to back-office services. Although many “big 8” firms think they specialize in Asia, Dezan Shira is the only firm that I know of with the breadth, depth, and expertise across the region. My compliments to the team for our 25 years of positive experience; I rely on, recommend, and trust you even more.

Stephen M. MorrisCOO, Asia Operations and Supply Chain

It has been pleasure working with the team. The Dezan Shira and Associates India team is very professional, always there to support clients, and are very accommodating.

Vikas AhujaCEO

Dezan Shira & Associates’ excellent integrated corporate service solutions and strategic advice, have played a crucial role for us in implementing our Singapore expansion plans.

Matthew RedshawManaging Director

Dezan Shira assists Organica Water with our corporate secretarial services, financial and tax advice in Asia. Their availability and high-level professional services have led to a valuable long-term relationship, resulting in global cooperation.

Henriett HORVÁTH-KOVÁCSDirector

Our company had already been operating in Asia for years. However, Dezan Shira's Business Intelligence team provided us with a country benchmarking study, that led us to make key decisions with our supply chain that has since increased our company's competitiveness.

Michael UngerExport Director Asia

Mastip has found Dezan Shira team to be very helpful and always readily available to provide assistance on any occasion. For us, employing staff without a registered office was not possible. However, Dezan Shira and Associates made this possible and have helped to add considerable value to our company by allowing us to recruit the right caliber of people. The team has always helped in a timely manner, and we find their services professional and efficient.

Brett ReynoldsSenior Vice President, International Sales & Marketing

We have always received quality service in any country we have had the opportunity to work with them, particularly in China and India. All the cases we have handled together on behalf of our international clients have concluded positively and we manage to provide the required consultancy. The DSA team consistently offers comprehensive and detailed options for every request. They provide valuable advice, clarify doubts promptly, and support us until the goal is achieved. Their polite and supportive approach is commendable.

Andrea Benvenga Junior Immigration Consultant

From the complex Shanghai entity setup to tax advisory across several Asian jurisdictions, Dezan Shira & Associates provided us with value-added services that have allowed us to quickly grow and steady our business in the region.

Tilman StädtlerCFO

We find Dezan Shira and Associates’ India team to be very flexible, responsive, and supportive. They have been very efficient and have met our deadline. Their services are also efficient and professional.

Camille LiangCorporate Director of Human Resources

ACA intended to establish a liaison office in India to study the Indian market for future business prospect. Dezan Shira helped us chose an ideal office for our needs and provided complete support for set up and regulatory compliances associated with the process. The knowledgeable team ensured smooth communication - always providing clear and prompt responses to our questions. Client service and support has been excellent.

Dhawal UnunePolymer Chemist, Lab & Quality Manager

We’ve been using Dezan Shira as our service provider for corporate compliance, including company setup, amendment, and de-registration, legal advisory concerning localized policy and regulations, labor issues, visa services, tax and accounting, payroll and HR services, and more. We chose them because they consistently deliver services with high efficiency, professionalism, and comprehensive solutions. Their attention to detail and considerate approach have earned our full trust.

Ying SunGeneral Manager

Dezan Shira and Associates India team have supported our business both prior to and after the establishment of our subsidiary in 2019. They helped significantly during COVID personal involvement was less possible, assisted on legal and trademarking issues, conducting business in India, and ongoing guidance when issues inevitably arise. We appreciate their support and highly recommend Dezan Shira.

John KilbornDirector

Dezan Shira and Associates provides the Corman Group with a wide range of high-level accounting and financial consultancy services, and represents an important and valuable support for us to establish our company in Asia.

Simona BagnoliHead of Financial Reporting and Administration

DosBros is very satisfied with the International Master Franchising services provided by Dezan Shira and Associates. Their team demonstrated professionalism, promptness, and attention to detail through the entire process. The work was of the expected quality and efficacy. I would recommend their services to anyone in need of appropriate legal drafts and a pleasant customer experience.

Manish BhagchandaniCo-Founder

I had the privilege of being represented by Dezan Shira’s phenomenal legal team in China for a crucial case. Their deep understanding of international trade laws, meticulous approach, and professionalism played a vital role in successfully resolving the matter. Their proactive approach, vast knowledge, and commitment to their clients are truly commendable. Their services have proven to be invaluable, and I wholeheartedly recommend them. With their exceptional expertise and unwavering dedication, you will surely be in capable hands.

Giuseppe Scotto d'AntuonoChief Executive & Co-founder

Operating a business in a challenging environment, particularly during the initial stages of incorporation, can be tough. The team at Dezan Shira demonstrated support, consistency, enthusiasm, as well as dedication and timeliness towards the work. Most importantly, they were cooperative and flexible, enabling us to realign our business strategy as required. Their support and level of integration kept us agile and we were able to take timely corrective decisions.

Alam TanveerCountry Manager, India

Dezan Shira & Associates’ excellent integrated corporate service solutions and strategic advice have played and continue to play a crucial role for us in the development of our interests in China. Their professionals are extremely reliable, quick to respond and concrete in proposing the best solutions. Finally, being able to deal with professionals who, if necessary, also speak your language is certainly a particularly important added value.

Rosalba CartellaChief Financial Officer

I am extremely grateful for the exceptional HR and accounting services provided by Dezan Shira Beijing HR and Accounting team. Your professionalism, expertise, and seamless integration of HR, payroll, accounting, and tax functions supported us greatly in formalizing employment structures and meeting local compliance requirements in the China market, enabling us to focus on our core activities. I highly recommend Dezan Shira to any business in need of top-notch outsourcing services.

Huian ZhuChina Chief Representative

Our web search led us to Dezan Shira, the best company out of our options for brand logo registration in China. The team, especially Miss Monica, were professional and helpful, explaining the process and advising on effective options. Their expertise and professionalism ensured a successful registration in a timely manner. Overall, we highly recommend Dezan Shira as a reliable partner for registrations and other services in China and Asia.

Edmondo AngelaccioGeneral Manager

Dezan Shira’s expertise in compliance, payroll, and HR services, including Employment Pass applications, has been nothing short of exceptional. The Singapore team consistently demonstrat their professionalism and dedication to ensuring our company's success. Their in-depth understanding of the Singapore market made our transition into the region seamless and efficient.

Summer ChenCo-Chief Administrative Officer

Our decision to work with Dezan Shira at the early stage of our expansion into Vietnam enabled us to have a solid and skilled partner who knew the local tax constrains, laws, and more importantly, was able to provide solutions at each step. Three years later, topics have changed, problems are different, and the Dezan Shira team remains at our side to provide tailored support.

Victoria CheaFinance and Operations Director
